info.description: Bare Bottom Potty Training, an unconventional, though not entirely uncommon form of toilet training. Whether they be au naturel from the waist down (shoes and socks being an exception) or commando ubder their shorts/pants/skirts, follow these lads and lasses through their potty training adventures.
